keyPolicies.policyDescription: Say YES to referendums on all major issues.
Say NO to wasting Â£45 million a day in Brussels.
We have to leave the EU. Only UKIP will make that happen.

issues.brexitEurope: We have to leave the EU. You may think we are reasonably well out but we could be better off. Watch out for the 'fear' of us bailing out Eurozone debt, why do we believe we are so rich and clever we can sort everyone else's mess? Let's get our own house in order first, financially, then if we're rich we may be rich and clever enough to end wider world debt.
issues.economy: Watch out for the 'fear' of us bailing out Eurozone debt.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am 56 years old, have been married for 34 years and have two grown-up children and a six-year-old granddaughter. I have lived in a small village called Southrey for 17 years and really enjoy the contrast of the tranquil Lincolnshire countryside and the bustling thriving city of Lincoln.

politicalExperience.role: Train guard employed by East Midlands Trains. Previously I managed the Texas Homecare store on Tritton Road before it closed.
politicalExperience.achievements: I have always been a public servant. I believe billions are wasted on quangos, the unwanted ID card scheme, the NHS database fiasco, the scandalous PFIs and, of course, the EU.
